noun.description: (in the fictional word of the comic book, TV, and film character Superman) an alien mineral that has the property of depriving Superman of his powers.
examples: the evil Lex Luthor diminishes Superman's powers with kryptonite

origin: 1940s: from Krypton, the name of Superman's home planet (kryptonite is usually depicted as a green mineral that came to earth from Krypton, following its destruction).
